Initial_Tour.name: Start
Initial_Tour.description: This is the start of the tour, once you see this then you are ready to go

Initial_Tour.name: C001 Lecture Hall
Initial_Tour.description: A large lecture hall where some classes will take place

Initial_Tour.name: Charles Oakley Building
Initial_Tour.description: One of the main buildings on the GCU campus, mainly used by those studying science

Initial_Tour.name: George Moore Building
Initial_Tour.description: One of the main buildings on the GCU campus, it contains the Saltire centre and the library. Most students will spend some time in this building

Initial_Tour.name: Saltire Centre
Initial_Tour.description: A large open space used by students to do independent learning as well as meeting people

Initial_Tour.name: Library
Initial_Tour.description: The library contains a large amount of relavent books as well as areas with computers that students are free to use

Initial_Tour.name: Using Computers
Initial_Tour.description: Your first task is to use the credentials that you were given to log into this computer, if you need assistance ask one of the advisors nearby

Initial_Tour.name: Students Association Building
Initial_Tour.description: The students association building contains resources for students to utilise

Initial_Tour.name: 24 Hour Lab
Initial_Tour.description: The 24 hour lab is open at all hours of the day for students to come in and use whenever then wish

Initial_Tour.name: Email
Initial_Tour.description: Your Second task is to log into a computer and send an email to your induction leader at this address: email@gcu.ac.uk. If you need assistance ask one of the advisors nearby

Initial_Tour.name: M137 Lab
Initial_Tour.description: This is a typical lab in GCU, they are normally used for classes but if they are not in use then students may freely use them unless otherwise stated

Initial_Tour.name: GCULearn
Initial_Tour.description: Your final task is to log in again and go to the GCULearn website: http://blackboard.gcal.ac.uk/, take a few minutes to explore the site, paying attention to the modules you're assigned to

Initial_Tour.name: Hamish Wood Building
Initial_Tour.description: One of the main buildings on the GCU campus, the Hamish Wood Building contains lecture halls and classrooms that can be used by anyone

Initial_Tour.name: W110 Lecture Hall
Initial_Tour.description: This is another lecture hall, slightly smaller than C001 but the purpose is the same, this is the final location and if you've madeit here you have finished the initial tour

Initial_Tour.name: Completed
Initial_Tour.description: This is the end of the tour, once you see this then you are finished and should await instructions from your induction leader
